section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purpose of this chapter, the term:

para.text: “Commission” means the District of Columbia Residential, Commercial, and Institutional Structures Fire Protection Study Commission established by § 3-1102.
“Committee” means the Interdepartmental Advisory Committee established by § 3-1107.
“Council” means Council of the District of Columbia.
“Mayor” means the Mayor of the District of Columbia.

annotations.annotation: The reference in paragraph (2) to “§ 3-1107” appeared in D.C. Law 5-183 as “§ 2-3106 [1981 Ed.].” The reference should have been to 2-3107 [1981 Ed.], given the sense of the text. Section 2-3107 was recodified as § 3-1107 in the 2001 Edition.
